text: Richard Philip Schafrath (March 21, 1937 â€“ August 15, 2021) was an American offensive lineman football player and politician. He played for the Cleveland Browns from 1959 until 1971. He was a member of the Ohio Senate from 1987 until 2000 as a member of the Republican Party. Schafrath was born in Wooster, Ohio. Schafrath died on August 15, 2021 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American football offensive tackles Category:Cleveland Browns players Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Ohio Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Dick Schafrath
